title: Amazing unit with outdoor sundeck w grills, heated pool, gym, yoga rm

This amazing luxury hi rise building is located in Chicago's new East Side, just steps away from the river and lake.
Take advantage of this luxurious convertible apartment.
Cats & dogs ok.
Garage parking extra.

Notes- we have renovated and non renovated units, renovated cost more for upgrades, please inquire   This building has fabulous amenities including: -24 hour doorman -Gorgeous lake, river and city views -Extra bike/storage area -Full business and conference center on site -Fitness center and club room in the building -Heated indoor pool and sauna -Outdoor sundeck area with BBQ -Private yoga room -Guest suite in building for your family and friends visiting -Close access to the indoor pedway for train access    This recently renovated unit offers a contemporary feel with dramatic finishes including: -Bay windows with panoramic views of the city -Custom window treatments -Hardwood and carpet available -Gorgeous maple cabinets throughout -Central
A/C -Custom closets and very generous closet space throughout including walk in closet space -Extra
Individual storage area -W/D in unit
Velocity Apartment Group
*****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.
Thank you.
